Chloe Bringmann

@cbringmann on WordPress.org, @Chloé Bringmann on Slack 









Member Since:
February 21st, 2020


Location:
New York, NY


Job Title:
Division Operations/Communication


Employer:
Automattic


Find me on:





 

Bio

As an Automattic sponsored contributor, I actively contribute to WordPress Core, Marketing, and Documentation teams.
My career has consisted of psychotherapy, finance, and operations across non-profit and tech sectors – the throughline being operational support in mission-driven work. To join the open source WordPress project is a joy and a daily learning opportunity.

Interests

Literature (primarily fiction), international travel, depth psychology, coaching, foodie, dancing, Shiba Inus (mine in particular).


				Contributions
									Sponsored


Automattic sponsors Chloe Bringmann to contribute 40 hours per week to the following teams: Core, Documentation, and Marketing.
